title: 28 27 28 "Blitz Krieg""I Won't Die! Fierce Battle! Luffy vs. Krieg!"Transliteration: "Shinanee yo! Gekitō Rufi vs Kurīku!" (Japanese:死なねェよ!激闘ルフィVSクリーク!) Junji Shimizu Junki Takegami 912.1 June 7, 2000(2000-06-07)[53] April 2, 2005[54]
transformers_text: 28 27 28 Blitz Krieg I Won't Die Fierce Battle Luffy vs Krieg Transliteration Shina nee yo Gek it Ru fi vs Kur ku Japanese VS Junji Shimizu Junk i Take gam i 912 1 June 7 2000 2000 06 07 53 April 2 2005 54 Out of nowhere a gas mask lands in Luffy's lap and he puts it on just as the MH 5 impacts and explodes It is revealed that the mask was G in's while he held Sanji's to his face Krieg succeeds in poisoning G in and Patty and Carne pull him inside the Bara tie to administer first aid Outraged once again Luffy runs for Krieg who pulls out his Needle Gun again but the bullets don't even hinder Luffy as he prep e are s his Gum Gum Pistol Krieg pulls out his spiked Porcupine Cape and covers himself but Luffy punches right into Krieg's face Luffy seems to have the advantage in the fight until Krieg pulls out his explosive Battle Spear Luffy takes a hit every time he strikes the spear but eventually breaks the tip
tf_idf_text: blitz krieg wont die fierce battle luffy krieg transliteration shina nee gek kur japanese junji shimizu junk take gam june april nowhere gas mask land luffys lap put impact explodes reveal mask in hold sanjis face krieg succeed poison patty carne pull inside bara tie administer first aid outrage luffy run krieg pull needle gun bullet dont even hind luffy prep gum gum pistol krieg pull spike porcupine cape cover luffy punch right kriegs face luffy seem advantage fight krieg pull explosive battle spear luffy take hit every time strike spear eventually break tip
